verbs.description: himym alternate ending [V: gets] [ARG1: it right] the alternate ending was simply unquantifiably better than the original thank you carter bays and craig thomas for rectifying your horrendous blunder i think it best we all pretend that the original ending never happened at least now i wo n't have to sell my himym boxset on ebay barney craig thomas screenwriter tracy ted carter bays robin
